P

paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class fast3d.fragment.FragPanel3d
 
paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class fast3d.Panel3d
 
Panel3d - Class in fast3d
a swing component to display a 3d-scene, containing a universe
subclasses are permitted the possibility to override the render()-method to draw directly into the 3d-scenery or to override the preRender()-method to prepare all data to be draw (for instance apply camera-movement or transformations of the scenery)
applies the screens aspect ratio automatically to the camera HUDs- Head-up-Displays and 2d GUI components:
Panel3d(Universe) - Constructor for class fast3d.Panel3d
default settings:
background black foreground white double buffered disabled focusable
perform(Vector3d) - Method in interface fast3d.complex.VertexAction
to manipulate the given vertex
pi - Static variable in class fast3d.util.math.MathUtil
the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter - 3.141592653589793 - 180 degrees
pick(int, int) - Method in class fast3d.Panel3d
used to pick all Renderables by click on the panel
may return null if rayTracing is not supported by the universe or no Renderable was detected
works like a 3d-click
pickClosest(int, int) - Method in class fast3d.Panel3d
used to pick the closest-to-the-camera Renderable of all Renderables in the Universe by click on the panel
may return null if rayTracing is not supported by the universe or no Renderable was detected
piOver2 - Static variable in class fast3d.util.math.MathUtil
halve pi - 1.5707963267948965 - 90 degrees
piOver4 - Static variable in class fast3d.util.math.MathUtil
fourth part of pi - 0.78539816339744825 - 45 degrees
piOver8 - Static variable in class fast3d.util.math.MathUtil
fourth part of pi - 0.39269908169872415 - 22.5 degrees
pixel(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.graphics.Graphics3d
shades the given vertex and sets the pixel to the previous set color by setColor(Color)
works like drawing a 3d-pixel
pixel(Vector3d, int) - Method in class fast3d.graphics.Graphics3d
shades the given vertex and sets the pixel to the previous set color by setColor(Color)
works like drawing a 3d-pixel
Pixel - Class in fast3d.renderables
visualized like a 3d-pixel (a point with a width of 1px and a color)
no matter how far the camera is away, a pixel will always be shaded to the size of one single pixel on the screen
points/pixels disappear on mathematically correct ray-tracing imaging, because they have no actual width (like when using the DefaultFragmentShader)
Pixel(Vector3d, Color) - Constructor for class fast3d.renderables.Pixel
constructs a new 3d-pixel on the specified location and with the specified color
both can be changed directly by the references given by getPos() and getColor()
Plate - Class in fast3d.math.geom
representing a geometric (infinitely large) plate in 3d space
a mathematical plate has no thickness or other properties other than it's base position and orientation
Plate(Vector3d, Vector3d, Vector3d) - Constructor for class fast3d.math.geom.Plate
constructs a new plate
all given vectors must be finite and dir1 must not be parallel to dir2
playAudio() - Static method in class fast3d.util.SimpleAudio
 
playAudio(Mixer) - Static method in class fast3d.util.SimpleAudio
requests a line to play raw audio data on from the mixer
playAudio(String) - Static method in class fast3d.util.SimpleAudio
a wrapper around audioPlayer(String)
because the result-thread will do various I/O interrupt() will not work
Point - Class in fast3d.math.geom
representing a geometric point (a position in 3d-space)
a point has no real width or diameter so it is infinitely small - also it has no other properties than it's position (e.g. no color)
Point(Vector3d) - Constructor for class fast3d.math.geom.Point
constructs a new point on the given location
Point(double, double, double) - Constructor for class fast3d.math.geom.Point
constructs a new point on the given location
PointLight - Class in fast3d.complex.light
a point light works like the light out of some street light
PointLight(Universe, Color, Vector3d) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.light.PointLight
because this sort of light is located, it may be obstructed and cause shadow behind a Renderable
polygon(Vector3d...) - Method in class fast3d.graphics.Graphics3d
shades all vertices using shadeAll() and draws a polygon over these pixels (filled if wireFrameMode is false)
works like drawing a 3d-polygon (should be not too big in complex sceneries) if wireframeMode is on(true), a polygon is just a polyline where the first and last point are equal
polyline(Vector3d...) - Method in class fast3d.graphics.Graphics3d
shades all vertices using shadeAll() and draws a polyline over these
works like drawing a 3d-polyline (should be not too big in complex sceneries)
if wireframeMode is on(true), a polygon is just a polyline where the first and last point are equal
pos - Variable in class fast3d.complex.light.PointLight
the position of this light-source in the universe
position - Variable in class fast3d.util.AVec
the location of what is to be moved
preRender() - Method in class fast3d.Panel3d
called before every drawing activity or initializing the graphics3d-context
called in paintComponent()
every camera movement or changes on the scene should be done here
subclasses are requested to call super, because of some automatically stuff the super class may do
if a control is set, subclasses should call super.preRender() to not break the control-input-performance
propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent) - Method in class fast3d.control.Control
